name: Momentum Breakout Strategy
description: High-probability momentum breakout with volume confirmation. Targets stocks breaking above resistance with strong volume.

name: Mean Reversion RSI Strategy
description: Mean reversion strategy using RSI oversold/overbought conditions. Best in ranging markets.

name: Trend Following EMA Crossover
description: Classic trend following strategy using EMA crossovers. Works best in trending markets.

name: Volume-Price Divergence Strategy
description: Detects divergences between price and volume to identify potential reversals.

name: VWAP Bounce Strategy
description: Trades bounces off VWAP with volume confirmation. Effective for intraday trading.

name: Breakout with Pullback Strategy
description: Waits for pullback after initial breakout before entering. Reduces false signals.

name: Gap Fill Strategy
description: Trades gaps that tend to fill. Works well with volume confirmation.

name: Multi-Timeframe Trend Alignment
description: Requires trend alignment across multiple timeframes for high-probability entries.

name: Bollinger Band Squeeze Strategy
description: Trades breakouts from Bollinger Band squeezes. High volatility expansion plays.

name: Support/Resistance Bounce Strategy
description: Trades bounces off key support/resistance levels with confirmation.

name: MACD Histogram Divergence Strategy
description: Trades MACD histogram divergences for early trend reversal signals.

name: Earnings Play Strategy
description: Trades around earnings announcements with volatility expansion plays.

name: Sector Rotation Strategy
description: Trades sector rotation by identifying leading and lagging sectors.

name: High-Frequency Mean Reversion
description: Intraday mean reversion on 5-minute charts with tight stops.

name: Fibonacci Retracement Strategy
description: Trades Fibonacci retracement levels with volume confirmation.

name: Options Flow Strategy
description: Trades based on unusual options activity and flow data.

name: News Sentiment Momentum Strategy
description: Trades momentum based on news sentiment scores and price action.

name: Double Top/Bottom Reversal Strategy
description: Trades classic double top/bottom reversal patterns with confirmation.

name: Low Volatility Breakout Strategy
description: Trades breakouts from low volatility periods. High-probability setups.

name: Institutional Flow Strategy
description: Trades based on institutional buying/selling patterns detected from volume analysis.

name: SMA 20/50 Trend Follower
description: Trend-following equity strategy using 20/50 SMA cross on liquid large-cap stocks.

name: RSI Reversion on Index ETFs
description: Mean-reversion strategy on broad index ETFs after short-term oversold conditions.

name: Breakout with Volume Confirmation
description: Classic breakout strategy above recent resistance with strong volume confirmation.

name: Crypto Trend Rider
description: Trend-following on major crypto pairs using EMA 20/50 cross and hourly candles.

name: Crypto Range Fade
description: Mean-reversion on large-cap crypto during clearly defined ranges.
